title: Seth Greene - Direct Response Marketing For the Win
itunes:title: Seth Greene - Direct Response Marketing For the Win
description:
Do you know who you are? Tons of entrepreneurs don't - and they fail because of it. So that ladder you're climbing needs to be standing on you, your skills, your value, and the people you're trying to reach with all those things.
 
Seth Greene is a legendary entrepreneur, author and master of direct response marketing. He specializes in helping other entrepreneurs grow their business through podcasting and content spanning books, social media and more. Seth himself is also a best-selling author and the co-host of the Sharkpreneur podcast.
 
On this episode of the Underdog Empowerment podcast, Seth and Zach dive deep on being the guy at the top of the mountain, the process of getting clients you can actually win for, and the need to define what the point is of all this work you're doing. Tune in for real insight from someone who has actually worked his way up from nothing.
 
Shownotes: https://underdogempowerment.com/seth-greene/
 
Get More Involved: 
 
  1. Leave A Review & Subscribe On iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/underdog-empowerment/id1373572178
  2. Free A-to-Z roadmap on launching a top-shelf podcast: https://www.podcastpenthouse.com/roadmaps/
  3. Access Our Top Resource Recommendations: https://underdogempowerment.com/resources/
  4. Subscribe On YouTube: https://underdogempowerment.com/youtube
